name: Hidden & Dangerous 2
description:
Hidden & Dangerous 2 is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Illusion Softworks. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Gathering. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Hidden & Dangerous 2 is available on PC.
It was produced by Lukás Kure. Petr Vochozka directed the game. Martin Benes and Michal Szlavik scored the game.
